name: Yo Yeti
description:
There's nothing mythical about this beast. Catch a sighting of Yo Yeti™ as he brings cool personality to Spooky Link™. Featuring Mo Mummy’s Free Games and Jackpot, this levels up the ante with its signature Cash Collect feature. Yo Yeti™ pops up at random to lob snowballs into the reels for your chance at credit prizes, jackpots, and more spin!

Game Features:

• FREE GAMES & JACKPOT FEATURE: Brings back the Free Games & Jackpot features from original Mo Mummy. In Free Games, all Royal symbols are removed from reel strips so only the highest paying symbols remain. In the Jackpot Feature, players pick from 15 symbols until they match 3 jackpots or bonus prizes to win
• YO YETI FEATURE: In the Yo Yeti feature, the Yeti character randomly appears and throws snowballs into the reels that turn into credit prizes, jackpots, and +1 spin prizes
shortDescription: Yo Yeti™ is an avalanche of fun!

metaTags.title: Yo Yeti
metaTags.description: Yo Yeti™ is an avalanche of fun!

name: Winner's World
description:
Winners World 2.5 offers an 89 multi-game suite of Aristocrat’s best performing Slot titles with additional Keno, Blackjack, Roulette, and player-favorite Poker games. Featuring all the favorite poker game options along with Slot games such as Wild Lepre' Coins, Buffalo Gold, Storming Jackpots, Sky Rider and may more. Keno games include Buffalo, Miss Kitty, Cash Express 4-card and much more.

Game Features:

• Variety of Games: Games included in Winner's World are Slots, Keno, Poker, Blackjack and Roulette
• Unique Advantage: More Variety, More Unique Players, More Games available as a bartop or stand-alone cabinet on casino floors
shortDescription: Where the Buffalos roam and the winners play

metaTags.title: Winner's World
metaTags.description: Where the Buffalos roam and the winners play

name: Valley of Riches
description:
Mo’ Mummy Valley of Riches™ features Cash Collect, a feature you’ll find different than the way you’ve played before. Eye catching graphics and memorable characters create a feast for the senses. With this many ways to achieve bonuses, an enticing expedition of this ancient valley awaits.

Game Features:

• Cash Collect Feature: Triggered by landing a mummy on reel 1 and a green gem on any other reel. Feature is played on 5x5 reel set with initial Mummy Zone starting as 2x2. All coin prizes landed inside the zone are awarded. A mummy collects more green gems to grow the zone up to 5x5 and win additional bonus spins
• Free Games: Triggered by landing Free Game symbols. Retriggers available
• Match-3 Jackpot: Wild blue gems may trigger metamorphic that awards Match-3 Jackpot feature to win jackpot

name: Ultimate Fast Cash
description: Ultimate Fast Cash

name: Triple Power
description: Triple Power Link™

name: Timber Wolf Triple Power
description:
Timber Wolf Triple Power™ is the newest game that combines the popular mechanics with the beloved Timber Wolf brand. All 3 Free Games bonuses elegantly complement each other, anchored with the popular Timber Wolf Gold™ bonus, the new Timber Wolf Rising™ bonus adds more reel positions and Timber Wolf Bucks™ bonus provides a unique Jackpot chase for maximum excitement.

Game Features:

• Free Games: 3 unique Free Games features with triple metamorphic trigger in addition to the classic 3+ scatter symbol trigger. Combine up to 3 features for the ultimate experience: 
•	Timber Wolf Rising™ - Matrix expands to 4-5-6-5-4 during feature
•	Timber Wolf Gold™ - Collect Gold Buffalo during feature to convert other symbols to Buffalo
•	Timber Wolf Bucks™ - Collect cash bags during feature. Green cash bags award credits. Gold cash bags award Credits/Jackpots
shortDescription: Free games available in three thrilling ways

metaTags.title: Timber Wolf Triple Power
metaTags.description: Free games available in three thrilling ways

name: Super Tiger and Dragon
description:
Fortune Harmony Grand Spins™ Super Tiger & Dragon™ is a beast of a game in its own right. Available on the MarsX Portrait, this game adds a wheel mechanic onto the Fortune Harmony formula to give players a chance at triggering bigger bonuses. The eponymous Super Tiger and Dragon metamorphics may be triggered during the Super Hold & Spin feature, where players may get access to the double Hold & Spin feature without having to trigger the Tiger and Dragon at the same time.

Game Features:

• SUPER HOLD & SPIN: Triggered from the wheel, a Hold & Spin features 2 credit values per symbol position, respectively. The metamorphic may continue to trigger Win-All current values of its respective side
shortDescription: Now roaring on a Portrait screen

metaTags.title: Super Tiger and Dragon
metaTags.description: Now roaring on a Portrait screen

name: Super Panda and Ox
description:
When you see Super Panda & Ox™ together, you’re in for a great and rewarding time. Part of the Fortune Harmony Grand Spins™ game group and now available on the MarsX Portrait, it adds a wheel mechanic that lets players to trigger bigger bonuses than ever before. That's not all: triggering the Super Hold & Spin feature may grant players access to the double Hold & Spin without having to trigger the two metamorphics at the same time.

Game Features:

• SUPER HOLD & SPIN: Triggered from the wheel, a Hold & Spin features 2 credit values per symbol position, respectively. The metamorphic may continue to trigger Win-All current values of its respective side.

name: Sun of Ra
description:
Wild Pyramid Respins Sun of Ra ™ utilizes innovative mechanics to give players something original. Any 5 of a kind with Cash-on-Reel symbols pays immediately, Wilds substitute for Cash-on-Reel to provide even easier wins and the expanded Free Games reel matrix sets up thousands of ways to win. Good times beckon where the sun shines.

Game Features:

• CASH-ON-REEL: Cash-on-Reel symbols may appear on any reel at any time. A 5-of-a-kind win with Cash-on-Reel symbols awards all credits shown
• SHORT TERM WILD PERSISTENCE: Any full stack of wilds landed during base game play will remain on reels for 3 additional spins. These wilds expand with any reel growth and contribute to 5-of-a-kind Cash-on-Reel wins
• REEL GROWTH: During bonus free games, reels 3, 4, & 5 grow to 5, 6, and 8 spaces high respectively
• FREE GAMES: Landing scatter symbols awards free games, reels are expanded and full wild stacks persist for the entirety of the feature
shortDescription: Tap the power of the sun of Ra

metaTags.title: Sun of Ra
metaTags.description: Tap the power of the sun of Ra

name: Spring Festival
description:
An entertaining game from Dragon Link™, Spring Festival™ offers a treasure trove of Asian game themed excitement. The Fortune God entertains you with Big Symbols, a Hold & Spin jackpot feature, and unlimited Free Games in this multi-denomination slot game. There are exciting top progressive prizes as players play for the chance for the Grand Jackpot.

Game Features:

• HOLD AND SPIN JACKPOT: Hold & Spin in base or Free Games
• UNLIMITED FREE GAMES: With big symbols and Hold & Spin potential
• GRAND JACKPOT: Exciting top progressive prize
shortDescription: Battle the Samurai and Take Home the Gold

name: Silk Road
description:
Plot your path to glory on the Dragon Link Silk Road. Uncover bountiful rewards along the way with Hold & Spin and free games. For those who seek true adventure, pick up the trail where others have failed with linked grand jackpots. On this excursion, it's about the journey and the destination. You'll find both rewarding.

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN: Chance to win credit prizes and jackpots
• FREE GAMES: Big symbols for wild reel replacements
• GRAND JACKPOT: Exciting top progressive prize
shortDescription: Seek Fortune Beyond Your Wildest Dreams

metaTags.title: Silk Road
metaTags.description: Seek Fortune Beyond Your Wildest Dreams

name: Sensei Master
description:
Action-packed and feature-filled are some of the words to best describe Phoenix Link™ Sensei Master™. Housed in the Neptune Single cabinet, it boasts player-favorite Link features such as the classic Hold & Spin with scaling Grand and Major Jackpots. It also adds a new Phoenix Free Feature, where you have the chance to trigger a free Hold & Spin by collecting Phoenix symbols on screen towards a mystery hit-by meter. Finally, discover the Free Games feature with 2x Wild Multipliers for chances at amazing line wins.

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN: A player favorite, classic Hold & Spin gameplay with scaling Grand and Major Jackpot
• PHOENIX FREE FEATURE: All Phoenix symbols landed increment towards a counter with chances to trigger a free Hold & Spin
• FREE GAMES: This game features 2x Wild Multipliers for chances at great line wins
shortDescription: Get a kick out of this game

metaTags.title: Sensei Master
metaTags.description: Get a kick out of this game

name: Queen Chiu
description:
Seeing Queen Chiu™ on the floor surely demands attention. Marvel at one of the newest titles on Phoenix Link™ that's housed on the Neptune Single cabinet. Be in awe at its innovative gameplay, like the classic Hold & Spin gameplay with scaling Grand and Major Jackpots or the Phoenix Free Feature when all Phoenix symbols landed increment towards a counter with chances to trigger a free Hold & Spin. Plus Free Games feature with 2x Wild Multipliers for chances at amazing line wins.

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN: A player favorite, classic Hold & Spin gameplay with scaling Grand and Major Jackpot
• PHOENIX FREE FEATURE: All Phoenix symbols landed increment towards a counter with chances to trigger a free Hold & Spin
• FREE GAMES: This game features 2x Wild Multipliers for chances at great line wins

name: Piggy Burst
description:
This piggy bank is ready to burst and shower you with rewards in this fresh Hold & Spin that provides a nice mix of familiar gameplay and new features! Unlock seven different Hold & Spin bonuses when you land metamorphic triggers and collect big prizes and multipliers. Buy into the Hold & Spin bonus at any point in the game with Instant Feature, a brand new Aristocrat feature available for the first time ever!

Game Features:

• Hold & Spin Bonus: Trigger one, two, or all three metamorphic triggers to unlock 7 different Hold & Spin bonuses with big prize, multiplier, and award all features
• Instant Feature: The Instant feature option allows players to purchase directly into the Hold & Spin bonus

name: Phoenix Link
description: Phoenix Link™

name: Peacock Princess
description:
Peacock Princess™, the entertaining Asian-themed game from Dragon Link™ will invite players to strutting across the casino floor. This proud peacock offers chance for unlimited Free Games with Big Symbols and plenty of Hold & Spin potential. Players can play for a chance at exciting top progressive prizes and a chance at the Grand Jackpot in this multi denomination entertaining game

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN: Hold & Spin in base or Free Games
• UNLIMITED FREE GAMES: With big symbols and Hold & Spin potential
• GRAND JACKPOT: Exciting top progressive prize

name: Peace and Long Life
description:
We bring you Peace and Long Life, a Dragon Link game with a premium Hold & Spin experience. Players play for the golden peaches, and enjoy this entertaining game with the chance at Free Games. May the zen be with players as they play this exciting Asian-themed gaming experience.

Game Features:

• HOLD AND SPIN: Hold & Spin in base or Free Games
• FREE GAMES: With big symbols and Hold & Spin potential
• GRAND JACKPOT: Exciting top progressive prize

name: Panda Magic
description:
A fierce Hold & Spin choice, Panda Magic™, part of the Dragon Link™ / Dragon Cash™ family blends the thrill of gaming with a side of zen. With wide bet ranges and dynamic graphics, Panda Magic offers the chance for great retriggers and generous bonuses. Players are invited to play with the Panda for a brilliant, colorful Asian-themed entertaining gaming experience.

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN: Hold & Spin in base or Free Games
• GRAND JACKPOT: Exciting top progressive prize
• FREE GAMES: Free Games with royal symbols removed

name: Panda
description:
Follow the trail of the mighty panda as you search for prosperity, longevity and jackpots in Fu Dai Lian Lian's Panda™. With graphically entertaining jackpot triggers and different bonuses to pursue throughout the game, the jungle is wild. There's also a unique letter collection feature for a jackpot journey. Bonus action and wilds await as players collect the pandas and stack up the gold in this fun-filled, Asian inspired gaming experience.

Game Features:

• JACKPOT: Awards many Free Games with a unique letter collect feature that can award each jackpot
• LONGEVITY: Awards Free Games, all purple coins landed award Free Games & credit prizes with line wins multiplied
• MEGA: Triggered by achieving all three jackpot features at once
shortDescription: Take on the Panda of Prosperity

metaTags.title: Panda
metaTags.description: Take on the Panda of Prosperity

name: NFL Super Bowl Jackpots
description:
We are changing the game with this first-of-its-kind NFL-licensed slot machine, offering players the ability to customize their experiences by selecting their favorite team that they choose to play. Players have the chance to win a $1 million progressive jackpot, where permitted, and experience additional rich gameplay features, including six licensed fan-favorite stadium anthems during key moments in the game.
It’s time for you to get in the game.

Game Features:

• FREE GAMES: Players choose their volatility and collect Cash-on-Reel prizes in the free games
• WHEEL FEATURE: Each wheel symbol collected in the Cash Blitz feature awards one spin of the Jackpot Wheel
• CASH BLITZ: Base game feature with Cash-on-Reel prizes, bonus triggers, and expanding reel arrays
shortDescription: PICK YOUR TEAM. PLAY YOUR TEAM.

metaTags.title: NFL Super Bowl Jackpots
metaTags.description: PICK YOUR TEAM. PLAY YOUR TEAM.

name: Moon Race
description:
Moon Race™, part of the Lightning Link™ / Lightning Cash™ family, is a cosmic adventure to another world. Walk with the astronauts in this multi-denomination game with Cash-on-Reels, Hold & Spin jackpot action and scalable bonus prizes. During Free Games, feel the entertainment as royals are removed and only PIC symbols appear. Win a chance for even more Free Games when a full scatter lands on the BIG reel in this race to reach the moon.

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN JACKPOT: Hold & Spin in base or Free Games
• FREE GAMES: King, Queen, Jack, Ten, and Nine symbols removed, which increases the chance for big 5-of-a-kind wins
• LUCKY CHANCE SPIN: Players can wager away those annoying insufficient credits in this exciting cash out option
shortDescription: One Giant Leap for Gaming Kind

metaTags.title: Moon Race

name: Mo Mummy

name: Mo Mummy
description:
We can't keep this one under wraps anymore! The beloved Mo Mummy™ returns in Spooky Link™. A unique Cash Collect feature offers a new twist: randomly awarded multipliers for a single spin. Add that with the original Free Games and Jackpot features, and you've got a brand new way to play full of your chances at prizes and fun.

Game Features:

• FREE GAMES & JACKPOT FEATURE: Brings back the Free Games & Jackpot features from original Mo Mummy. In Free Games, all Royal symbols are removed from reel strips so only the highest paying symbols remain. In the Jackpot Feature, players pick from 15 symbols until they match 3 jackpots or bonus prizes to win
• MO MUMMY FEATURE: The Mo Mummy feature randomly awards 2x and 3x multipliers for a single spin that multiply credit prizes, jackpots, and +1 spin prizes
shortDescription: Mo ways to win with Mo Mummy™!

metaTags.title: Mo Mummy
metaTags.description: Mo ways to win with Mo Mummy™!

name: Mighty Pyramid
description:
Mo’ Mummy Mighty Pyramid™ unleashes Cash Collect, an exciting new feature that is different than the way you’ve played before. Bonuses that can be triggered so many ways, and the eye-catching graphics, characters and extras make the Might Pyramid one of the most thrilling and attractive new games available.

Game Features:

• Cash Collect Feature: Triggered by landing a mummy on reel 1 and a green gem on any other reel. Feature is played on 5x5 reel set with initial Mummy Zone starting as 2x2. All coin prizes landed inside the zone are awarded. A mummy collects more green gems to grow the zone up to 5x5 and win additional bonus spins
• Free Games: Triggered by landing Free Game symbols. Retriggers available
• Match-3 Jackpot: Wild blue gems may trigger metamorphic that awards Match-3 Jackpot feature to win jackpot

name: Magic Pearl
description:
Swim amongst the mermaids, sea turtles, and mystical treasures in Magic Pearl™, part of the Lightning Link™ / Lightning Cash™ family. This underwater adventure is a multi-denom game with scalable bonus prizes and the fan favorite Hold & Spin Jackpot feature. During Free Games, reels can become a BIG reel with the chance to win even more prizes. Find pearls and trigger Free Spins and loads of fun in this dive into the deep blue sea.

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN JACKPOT: Hold & Spin in base or Free Games
• FREE GAMES: Big dolphin symbol triggers 3 additional Free Games
• GRAND JACKPOT: Exciting top progressive prize
shortDescription: There's Treasure on the Ocean Floor

metaTags.description: There's Treasure on the Ocean Floor

name: Lightning Link
description: Lightning Link

name: Leprechauns
description:
No pinching needed here - Lucky Looters™ Leprechaun™ has it all to entertain you! Pig symbols dressed in green trigger rewards when they appear on the reels you spin: Get Cash-on-Reel values on reels 2-4 when a Pig symbol appears on reel 1 & 5; and Loot Spins can be triggered when a Pig lands on reel 1 or 5, which can award free games!

Game Features:

• LOOT SPINS: Metamorphically triggered by landing at least 1 Pig symbol, the Loot Spins awards free games depending on which pot is triggered. The Pig symbol(s) locks in place for the duration of the free games and Cash-on-Reel values are awarded for each pig on reels 1 and 5
• BASE GAME CASH-ON-REELS: Players are awarded Cash-on-Reel values for each Pig symbol that lands
shortDescription: Follow the pig to the pot o' gold

name: Kismet Kat
description:
Kismet Kat™ knows how to wheel and deal for a fortune of entertaining time. Let Kismet Kat help connect with Bonuses and Respins for bigger wins and better play. What is meant to be begins with one Kool Kat.

Game Features:

• WHEEL BOOST: Metamorphically triggered, players pick bonuses to increase the values on wheel wedges before spinning the wheel
• EXTRA POINTERS: Match 3 pick bonus to determine if the wheel will spin with active pointers. More pointers equate to more wins per spin
• KASH RESPINS: Players Spin the Wheel to determine number of spins they will play during the feature. During feature, Cash-on-Reel qualifier is locked on reel 1, with only Cash-on-Reels symbols paying. All wins multiplied by a random multiplier, varying by spin
shortDescription: This kat has a way with whimsy

metaTags.title: Kismet Kat
metaTags.description: This kat has a way with whimsy

name: Karma Kat
description:
Karma Kat™ offers a magic wheel that brings delight. Play with Karma Kat to find fortune with a spin of the wheel and an enchanting feel. Let your gameplay cast a pleasurable spell on time well spent.

Game Features:

• WHEEL BOOST: Metamorphically triggered, players pick bonuses to increase the values on wheel wedges before spinning the wheel
• EXTRA POINTERS: Match 3 pick bonus to determine if the wheel will spin with active pointers. More pointers equate to more wins per spin
• KASH RESPINS: Players Spin the Wheel to determine number of spins they will play during the feature. During feature, Cash-on-Reel qualifier is locked on reel 1, with only Cash-on-Reels symbols paying. All wins multiplied by a random multiplier, varying by spin
shortDescription: The Kat’s out of the bag and a blast!

metaTags.title: Karma Kat
metaTags.description: The Kat’s out of the bag and a blast!

name: Ju Cai Jin Gui - Dragon
description:
Ju Cai Jin Gui™ Dragon™ is the game that oozes joy in every colorful coin and symbol onscreen. Building on the legacy of the popular Fu Dai Lian Lian franchise, this game can be found on the new Baron Upright cabinet and has four metamorphics in play. Each of the coins trigger a different kind of free games, making each opportunity more exciting. And exclusive to this title is the popular Cash-on-Reels feature to best suit the kind of game players are looking for!

Game Features:

• JACKPOT FEATURE: Metamorphically triggered by any red coin. Free games with landed coins providing credits or letters to spell out jackpot names. Collecting all letters for a jackpot awards that prize
• STICKY WILDS: Metamorphically triggered by any purple coin. 8 free games with permanent sticky wilds. Landing more than one wild in the same space adds a multiplier
• SYMBOL UPGRADES: Metamorphically triggered by any green coin. Free games with landed coins awarding credits or upgrading major reel symbols to the top symbol for the remainder of the free games bonus
• DOUBLE WINDOW: Metamorphically triggered by any blue coin. Free games played on two reel matrices rather than 1
shortDescription: Coins of all colors, bonuses of all kinds!

metaTags.title: Ju Cai Jin Gui - Dragon
metaTags.description: Coins of all colors, bonuses of all kinds!

Ju Cai Jin Gui - Dragon Cabinet

name: Jackpot Carnival Power of 88
description:
Step right up onto excitement’s biggest stage and let the Power of 88™ lead you towards the carnival’s most desired prizes: ascending up the multiplier charts and free games with big stacks of reveal symbols.

Game Features:

• CLOWN FEATURE: Drop bonus balls to win credits and multipliers
• HAMMER FEATURE: Hammer credit prizes up the multiplier chart
• JACKPOT CARNIVAL BONUS: Connect bonus symbols across from left to right

name: Jackpot Carnival Buffalo
description:
At this carnival, the stampede’s only just begun taking Buffalo to a whole new level. Thunderous wins await as the Clown feature returns from the original, as well as free games with enough multipliers to make it a grand stamp!

• HAMMER FEATURE: Hammer credit prizes up the multiplier chart
• JACKPOT CARNIVAL BONUS: Connect bonus symbols across from left to right

name: House of the Dragon
description:
Soar into Westeros on dragon’s wing with clips, sound, and graphics from the blockbuster HBO series. You’ll gather dragon eggs that trigger individually, in multiples, or all at once to ignite fiery bonuses! Active eggs have the chance to reappear during the Hold & Spin bonus.

Game Features:

• GOLD EGG FEATURE: Golden eggs will trigger all 5 metamorphics simultaneously
• BOOST PRIZE FEATURE: Randomly boosts collected credit prizes
• AWARD ALL FEATURE: Combines all currently collected credit prizes onto one Cash-on-Reel position
• MEGA PRIZE FEATURE: Will increase the credit prize a random number of times, including jackpot prize
• DOUBLE ALL FEATURE: Multiplies all collected credit prizes by 2x
shortDescription: Gain the dragons, unite the house

metaTags.title: House of the Dragon
metaTags.description: Gain the dragons, unite the house

name: High Stakes
description:
Shows, roulette wheels and poker chips abound in the Vegas-themed slot, High Stakes™, part of the Lightning Link™ / Lightning Cash™ family. Take a trip down the strip in this multi-denomination game with Cash-on-Reels, scalable bonus prizes and Hold & Spin action. Watch during Free Games as reels become a BIG reel. What happens in Vegas could land you a chance at the Grand Jackpot and progressive prizes in this fun Sin City game.

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN JACKPOT: Hold & Spin in base or Free Games
• GRAND JACKPOT: Exciting top progressive prize
• FREE GAMES: Free Games with big symbols

name: Happy and Prosperous
description:
Try your chance for luck with Happy and Prosperous™ a jolly game, part of the Dragon Link™ / Dragon Cash™ family. Make Buddha laugh as players play this Asian themed game with multi-denom choices, wide bet ranges, Free Games and exciting Hold & Spin action. Enjoy the chance to stack up the gold coins and jackpots in this entertaining game.

Game Features:

• Hold & Spin: Popular Hold & Spin bonus
• Grand Jackpot: Exciting top progressive prize
• Free Games: Free Games with royal symbols removed
shortDescription: Rub the Belly of the Buddha

metaTags.title: Happy and Prosperous
metaTags.description: Rub the Belly of the Buddha

name: Golden Pyramid
description:
It's no mystery why Ultimate Fast Cash™ Golden Pyramid™ could become your favorite game: its eponymous Ultimate Fast Cash feature is a Hold & Spin that unlocks additional Cash-on-Reel values for players, it's got the Super Fast Cash coin symbol that can lead to larger credit prizes and the Super jackpot, and if that's not enough - you can trigger free games that reveal a common symbol, wild, or Cash-on-Reels!

Game Features:

• ULTIMATE FASH CASH: Triggered metamorphically by Cash-on-Reel values, the Ultimate Fast Cash feature is a Hold & Spin feature with unlockable reel growth as players land additional Cash-on-Reel values
• SUPER FAST CASH: When a Super Fast Cash coin lands in the unlocked Hold & Spin area, the player transitions to an additional Hold & Spin feature with larger credit prizes and an opportunity to win the Super jackpot prize
• REVEAL SYMBOL FREE GAMES: Free Game feature with stacks of symbols that reveal a common symbol, wild, or Cash-on-Reels

name: Golden Gong
description:
Will you find success striking the Golden Gong? Ring the gilded disk with Free Game rewards and really make some noise with Hold & Spin. You can seize the opportunity and pick up the mallet that others have put down for a chance at linked grand jackpots. Your fortune will ring through the ages.

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN: Chance to win credit prizes and jackpots
• FREE GAMES: Big symbols for wild reel replacements
• GRAND JACKPOT: Exciting top progressive prize

name: Golden Century
description:
Behold the gold in Golden Century™, part of the Dragon Link™ / Dragon Cash™ family. Featuring the famous Hold & Spin feature, scalable prize bonuses, and Cash-on-Reels, this Asian theme game is entertaining. Try you luck for the chance to win up to 250x your bet on a scatter. During the Golden Century free games, all special symbols will reveal the same symbol, including the chance for the jackpot.

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN: Popular Hold & Spin bonus

name: Go Ghost
description:
Raise your spirits in Spooky Link™ Go Ghost™! The iconic features from Mo Mummy™ are combined with the new Go Ghost™ feature in this hauntingly happy adventure. Go Ghost™ randomly drops in and booooost credit values!

Game Features:

• FREE GAMES & JACKPOT FEATURE: Brings back the Free Games & Jackpot features from original Mo Mummy. In Free Games, all Royal symbols are removed from reel strips so only the highest paying symbols remain. In the Jackpot Feature, players pick from 15 symbols until they match 3 jackpots or bonus prizes to win
• GO GHOST FEATURE: In the Go Ghost Feature, the Ghost character can come and randomly “Boooooost” the credit values as they land
shortDescription: Go Ghost™ with the Go Most!

metaTags.description: Go Ghost™ with the Go Most!

name: Genghis Khan
description:
Take entertainment to the casino floor with the new Dragon Link game, Genghis Khan. As players expand the kingdom, players embark on a premium Hold & Spin experience. This exciting games offers seamless interaction with simple entertainment and chances for lots of Free Games. Grab your sword and let the game excitement begin.

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN JACKPOT: Hold & Spin in base or Free Games
• FREE GAMES: With wild multipliers and Hold & Spin potential
• GRAND JACKPOT: Exciting top progressive prize

name: General Tso
description:
Classic Hold & Spin with scaling Grand and Major Jackpots? Twin Spins Free Games for chances at great line wins? And a new Phoenix Free Feature? That's a check on all fronts when you play General Tso™! One of the esteemed titles in the all-new Phoenix Link™ and housed in the formidable Neptune Single cabinet, this game comes with stunning graphics to make every play a fiery experience.

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN: A player favorite, classic Hold & Spin gameplay with scaling Grand and Major Jackpot
• PHOENIX FREE FEATURE: All Phoenix symbols landed increment towards a counter with chances to trigger a free Hold & Spin
• FREE GAMES: This game features Twin Spins for chances at great line wins and increased chances to win the Hold & Spin

name: Dragon Emperor Fortunes
description:
Feel the fiery heat in Dragon Emperor Fortunes. This game takes the Crazy Cash™ Hold & Spin bonus and adds a Repeat Pays Prize — combining triggered Crazy Cash values into a prize awarded each time a special symbol lands during the Crazy Cash feature. The more special symbols, the better!

Game Features:

• CRAZY CASH: Hold & Spin bonus
• CRAZY CASH XTRA
• REPEAT PAYS FEATURE: Awarded each time a special symbol lands during Crazy Cash feature
• FREE GAMES: With unlimited retriggers

name: Devil
description:
Is it hot in here, or is it just Lucky Looters™ Devil™? This game has Pig symbols that reward you with exciting bonuses like: Loot Spins that can award you with free games when you land and lock at least 1 Pig symbol on Reel 1 or 5, while the base game can award you with Cash-on-Reel values landed on reels 2-4 when you land a Pig symbol on reels 1 and 5.

Game Features:

• LOOT SPINS: Metamorphically triggered by landing at least 1 Pig symbol, the Loot Spins awards free games depending on which pot is triggered. The Pig symbol(s) locks in place for the duration of the free games and Cash-on-Reel values are awarded for each pig on reels 1 and 5
• BASE GAME CASH-ON-REELS: Players are awarded Cash-on-Reel values for each Pig symbol that lands

name: Crazy Chickens
description:
In Crazy Chickens™, three fun chickens are the heart & soul of a fun game experience combining features players enjoy in one package. Each chicken may trigger a Hold & Spin with a unique effect, with multiple metamorphics at once keep things interesting. Help these little chickies come home to roost and have a thrilling time doing so.

Game Features:

• INSTANT WIN: A green egg landing above the standard reel matrix awards all Cash-on-Reel prizes in that reel. Landing a win all symbol awards all Cash-on-Reel prizes in ALL reels
• JACKPOTS: A red egg landing above the standard reel matrix may read Mini, Minor, Major, or Grand. Collecting enough of any jackpot symbol wins their corresponding jackpots
• MULTIPLIERS: A “blurple” egg landing above the standard reel matrix multiplies all Cash-on-Reel prizes by the amount shown on the egg. All credit-on-reel prizes are awarded at the end of the feature

name: Confucius Say
description:
As one of the premiere titles in the new Phoenix Link™ game group, Confucius Say™ is destined to be a favorite. It boasts artwork inspired by ancient China and includes a plethora of incredible game features. Players will recognize Hold & Spin gameplay with scaling Grand and Major Jackpots, Twin Spins Free Games for chances at great line wins and increased chances to trigger the Hold & Spin, and the new Phoenix Free Feature that rewards a free Hold & Spin from a mystery hit-by meter triggered by collected Phoenix symbols. Confucius Say play now!

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN: A player favorite, classic Hold & Spin gameplay with scaling Grand and Major Jackpot
• PHOENIX FREE FEATURE: All Phoenix symbols landed increment towards a counter with chances to trigger a free Hold & Spin
• FREE GAMES: This game features Twin Spins for chances at great line wins and increased chances to win the Hold & Spin

name: Coin Trio
description: Coin Trio™

name: Chief Inferno
description:
Hot on the heels of Chief Platinum™ comes Chief Inferno™, the slot machine aflame with bonuses galore! The player-favorite Chief stacks are back and with even more firepower - like sunset wild stacks that pair with Chief stacks for bigger multipliers, and Inferno symbols that boost the Bonus Meter onscreen. You can also enjoy up to 4 kinds of upgrades to the Free Games bonus for your chance at massive rewards - ranging from additional free games to upgraded jackpot prizes!

Game Features:

• BONUS METER: Land Inferno symbols to fuel the Bonus Meter and unleash your chance at colossal rewards.
• FREE GAMES FEATURE: Every Free Game you collect gives you the chance to upgrade your rewards in one of four ways: more Free Games, more Chief symbols, more wilds, or larger jackpot prizes!

name: Cashman Kingdom
description:
Cashman is back with some new friends to give this Aristocrat classic a fresh look and feel. Meet seven all-new characters that bring unique mechanics to the game’s Hold & Spin feature, which you can buy into during your game! Land the Epic King or Queen of Cashman Kingdom to receive enhancements on free spins to help maximize your bonuses.

Game Features:

• Cashman Hold & Spin Feature: Seven new Cashman characters that each have a unique functionality during the Hold & Spin feature. Innovative treasure chest symbol with 10-spin countdown to win jackpot awards
• Free Games Feature: A stack of 3 wilds is added to reels 2-5 every free game to greatly increase the chance of a big wild win
• Instant Feature: At any point, players can buy into the Cashman Hold & Spin bonus

name: Cashman Bingo
description: Cashman Bingo

name: Cash Express Legend Choy Sun Doa
description:
Cash Express meets Choy Sun Doa™ for your chance at new features, a new meter, and fun ways to win!

Game Features:

• GATEWAY PICK FEATURE: This feature gives you the choice of Free Games, or entering a new Cash Express Legend Feature!
• CASH EXPRESS LEGEND FEATURE: This will award you with one or more colored trains with classic Cash Express gameplay and chances at a new Hold & Spin feature-in-feature
• CASH EXPRESS LEGEND BONUS METER: When the bonus meter is activated, one or multiple trains will be awarded! This could randomly award the Cash Express Legend Bonus by landing at least one Cash-on-Reel symbol

metaTags.title: Cash Express Legend Choy Sun Doa

images.label: Cash Express Legend Choy Sun Doa Logo
Cash Express Legend Choy Sun Doa Cabinet

name: Cash Express Legend Buffalo
description:
In this new Cash Express experience, get your chance at a Gateway Pick Feature which lets your choose between Buffalo Free Games or a new Cash Express Legend Feature!

Game Features:

• GATEWAY PICK FEATURE: This feature gives you the choice of Free Games, or entering a new Cash Express Legend Feature!
• CASH EXPRESS LEGEND FEATURE: This will award you with one or more colored trains with classic Cash Express gameplay and chances at a new Hold & Spin feature-in-feature
• CASH EXPRESS LEGEND BONUS METER: When the bonus meter is activated, one or multiple trains will be awarded! This could randomly award the Cash Express Legend Bonus by landing at least one Cash-on-Reel symbol

name: Cash Express Legend
description: Cash Express Legend™

name: Buffalo Triple Power
description:
Buffalo Triple Power™ is a first-of-its-kind game that blends the latest state-of-the-art mechanics with the beloved Buffalo brand. All 3 Free Games bonuses elegantly complement each other, anchored with the popular Buffalo Gold™ bonus, the new Buffalo Rising™ bonus adds more reel positions and Buffalo Bucks™ bonus provides a unique Jackpot chase for maximum excitement.

Game Features:

• Free Games: 3 unique Free Games features with triple metamorphic trigger in addition to the classic scatter symbol trigger, for the ultimate experience.
• Combine Up To 3 Features: Buffalo Rising™ - Matrix expands to 4-5-6-5-4 during feature. Buffalo Gold™ - Collect Gold Buffalo during feature to convert other symbols to Buffalo. Buffalo Bucks™ - Collect cash bags during feature; Green cash bags award credits; Gold cash bags award Credits/Jackpots.
• Multipliers: Wild multipliers are available in features
shortDescription: Three great ways to get free games

metaTags.title: Buffalo Triple Power
metaTags.description: Three great ways to get free games

name: Buffalo Gold Wheels of Reward
description:
Buffalo Gold Wheels of Reward introduces players to something exciting and new. Three wheels make sure no bonus is the same while offering the Classic Gold Collection experience with bigger multipliers, more chances to collect and better opportunities to connect on big winning spins. reward yourself with some golden playtime.

Game Features:

• FREE GAMES: Classic Gold Collection Feature, collecting golden buffalo heads transforms other major symbols into buffalo, players may retrigger for additional free games by landing 2 or more golden coins. While in Free Games players may also trigger any combination of Wheel Features
• MORE WAYS WHEEL: During free games, any landed “More Ways” Coin spins the More Ways Wheel – prizes on the wheel may grow the reels higher
• FREE GAMES WHEEL: During free games, landing 2 or more “Free Games” Coins spins the free games wheel. The wheel has 4 layers, landing more than two coins earns players wheel spins closer to the outmost layer, where awarded prizes increase
• MULTIPLIER WHEEL: During free games, landing any “Sunset Coin” spins the multiplier wheel. The spot in which the Sunset Coin was landed will be replaced by a WILD with a multiplier equal to the one landed on during the Multiplier Wheel Spin

images.label: Buffalo Gold Wheels of Reward Logo
Buffalo Gold Wheels of Reward Cabinet

name: Buffalo Gold Revolution
description:
An exciting new twist on a classic, Buffalo Gold™ stampedes onto the casino floor. This game is a player favorite. With the chance for of big wins in the base game and a Wheel Bonus that awards jackpots, credit prizes, Gold Buffalo or free games. It's a high energy journey through the desert plains. There's a slew of wild multipliers, plus Free Games when the Gold Buffalo come out to play.

Game Features:

• FREE GAMES: 8, 15 or 20 Free Games awarded with Gold Buffalo being the main entertainment! As more Buffalo Gold are collected, picture symbols will become buffalo for the remainder of the Free Games. Free Games always commence with Wheel Feature
• WHEEL FEATURE: Wheel bonus awards jackpots, credit prizes, Gold Buffalo or Free Games. Once the Free Games award has been achieved the wheel feature is completed
• WILD MULTIPLIERS: All wilds appear with a multiplier, multiplying all wins for that spin
shortDescription: Where the Buffalos are Pure Gold

metaTags.title: Buffalo Gold Revolution
metaTags.description: Where the Buffalos are Pure Gold

name: Buffalo Gamble
description:
This game takes the beloved Buffalo and adds an exciting new feature that really amps up the play. Push the Red or Black “Gamble” button and get a chance to double or even quadruple all of your wins. With new denom options, Multiplier Wilds and classic Buffalo Free Games, the stampede is on for good times and big prizes.

Game Features:

• GAMBLE WIN: Option to pick between Black/Red or Suits to multiply your wins
• FREE GAMES: Classic Buffalo Free Games
• MULTIPLIER WILDS: Wilds turn into multiplier Wilds during Free Games

name: Buffalo Chief
description:
Buffalo Chief™ is an amazing gaming experience with even bigger stacks and more ways to win – 3,456 in the base game alone. The Supercoin feature leads to 250 buffalo symbols during Free Games, and a mystery Gigantic Stampede feature with 16,000 ways to win with a guaranteed 5-of-a-kind Buffalo. The stampede is on is this premium slot experience that promises to be a wild ride.

Game Features:

• SUPERCOIN COLLECTION: Triggers a wheel that will add up to 250 additional Buffalo to the reel-strips
• FREE GAMES: Upgraded Buffalo Free Games awarding 8, 15, 20 games with re-triggers
• BUFFALO CHIEF STAMPEDE: Expanding reels increasing to 16,000 ways to win Buffalo
shortDescription: There's a New Buffalo In Town

metaTags.title: Buffalo Chief
metaTags.description: There's a New Buffalo In Town

name: Buffalo Ascension
description:
Buffalo Ascension™ builds on one of Aristocrat’s most iconic brands to deliver tons of new features and ways to win. Persistent reel growth offers an incredible 5,488 ways to win the base game! Collect gold arrows to win the progressive jackpot and enjoy upgraded free games where your rewards can multiply to huge amounts! Be on the lookout for stampedes and super stampedes that will add buffalo to your reels for the remainder of the spin.

Game Features:

• Progressive Jackpot: Land a gold arrow on reel 3 to win the progressive jackpot
• Enhanced Free Games: Awards traditional Buffalo Free Games with multipliers, and the reel that triggered the feature will stay 7 positions high until the end of the feature
• Stampede Feature: Buffalos run down reels and change at least one symbol to Buffalo for that spin
• Super Stampede Feature: Buffalos run down reels and change at least three symbols to Buffalo for that spin

name: Buffalo and Friends
description:
Buffalo & Friends™ combines the features of three other popular game titles to bring a whole new experience to life. Join More Chili, Wicked Winnings & Mr. Cashman as they run with the stampede to excitement, adventure and even more ways to win Free Games.

Game Features:

• CASHMAN FEATURE: The free games play like traditional Buffalo Free Games, however, randomly at the start or finish of any spin, Mr. Cashman may award, respins, additional free games, credits or jackpots, or additional Buffalo symbols
• MORE CHILI FEATURE: The free games play like traditional Buffalo Free Games, however, the players now start with 2 reel sets and can unlock up to 4 reel sets by collecting Chili symbols, and More Chili
• WICKED WINNINGS FEATURE: The free games play like traditional Buffalo Free Games, however, there is a special Wicked Winnings Wild symbol. If this symbol lands, the Wild will expand and the player will be awarded 1 respin, just like Wicked Winnings
shortDescription: The herd just got more diverse

metaTags.title: Buffalo and Friends
metaTags.description: The herd just got more diverse

name: Boost Tiger
description:
Play with the big cats on Fu Dai Lian Lian: Boost Tiger. This action-packed game features gold coins, and filling three separate bags brimming with jackpots. Grow the reels high with the Prosperity Boost. Collect letters and gold coins in the Jackpot Boost, and get plenty of Free Games and multipliers in the Longevity Boost. It's the powerful tiger taken to the next level of entertainment.

Game Features:

• PROSPERITY BOOST: Free Games with mystery wilds
• LONGEVITY BOOST: Free Games with multipliers. Coins award additional free games or credit prizes
• JACKPOT FEATURE: Collect Letters in the jackpot name to win that jackpot. Each Gold Coin may become a double Gold Coin for two prize wins
shortDescription: The Tiger Gets a Boost Like Never Before

metaTags.title: Boost Tiger
metaTags.description: The Tiger Gets a Boost Like Never Before

name: Boost Peacock
description:
Strut your tail feathers with Fu Dai Lian Lian: Boost Peacock. Grow your reels high with the Prosperity Boost. Get a chance for Free Games and credit prizes with the Longevity Boost and collect letters to win big in the Jackpot Boost. If you enjoy all the action of mystery bonuses, you'll find them in our pots of gold feature, all served up in colorful animation. It's all about the strut in this beautifully designed gaming experience from Aristocrat Gaming.

Game Features:

• PROSPERITY BOOST: Free Games with mystery wilds
• LONGEVITY BOOST: Free Games with multipliers. Coins award additional free games or credit prizes
• JACKPOT FEATURE: Collect Letters in the jackpot name to win that jackpot. Each Gold Coin may become a double Gold Coin for two prize wins

name: Bonus Boost Red Festival
description:
Bonus Boost Red Festival sets the night on fire with Hold & Spin action, randomly boosted prizes, Extra Spins and a multi-feature trigger. There's a chance to win 2, count 'em two, grand jackpots. And there's Firecracker stacks for players who enjoy the action of mystery bonuses. All wrapped up in a beautifully designed, Asian inspired, must play from Aristocrat.

Game Features:

• DOUBLE UP: Based on Mighty Cash Double Up™, 30 positions to be filled instead of 15
• EXTRA SPINS: Resets at 4 spins instead of 3
• ULTRA: Randomly boosted prizes
• MULTI-FEATURE TRIGGER: Ability to combine 2 or all Hold & Spin features in a single bonus

name: Bonus Boost Blue Festival
description:
Bonus Boost Blue Festival brings all the mechanics from classic titles like Fu Dai Lian Lian and Mighty Cash Ultra to create a whole new level of gameplay. With 3 Hold & Spin bonuses, and the chance to win two grand progresivess, there is firecraker action and lots of surprises around every spin.

Game Features:

• DOUBLE UP: Based on Mighty Cash Double Up™, 30 positions to be filled instead of 15
• EXTRA SPINS: Resets at 4 spins instead of 3
• ULTRA: Randomly boosted prizes
• MULTI-FEATURE TRIGGER: Ability to combine 2 or all Hold & Spin features in a single bonus

name: Blue Prosperity
description:
Bao Zhu Zhao Fu Ignite™ Blue Prosperity™ is a party housed in the innovative Baron cabinet. It has the classic details players know and improves on them: The Triple Metamorphic mechanic now blends four features into one complete package, resulting in 15 different bonus combinations from Ultra, Zone, Double, or Extra Spins features. And a first for this title is the ability for players to unlock additional features during their bonuses, meaning any firecracker can lead to four features!

Game Features:

• CLASSIC BAO ZHU FEATURES: Hold & Spin features from Bao Zhu Zhao Fu Red, Blue, Purple, & Jade all return in one package. Players may metamorphically trigger Ultra, Zone, Double, or Extra Spins features
• UNLOCKING FEATURES: Metamorphic triggers are still active during bonuses. Players may trigger with one bonus feature but unlock additional features during their initial bonus

name: Bigger Fu Cash Bats
description: Bigger Fu Cash Bats™

name: Best Bet
description:
It's a run for the roses in Best Bet™, part of the Lightning Link™ / Lightning Cash™ family. Go for the gold cup with a Hold & Spin jackpot feature that offers the opportunity to win multiple jackpots, bonuses and credit prizes. Make the horse neigh as you race for Free Games with royals removed and exciting top progressive prizes in this entertaining pony classic.

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN: Hold & Spin in base or Free Games
• GRAND JACKPOT: Exciting top progressive prizes
• FREE GAMES: Free Games with royals removed

name: Bao Zhu Zhao Fu Ignite
description: Bao Zhu Zhao Fu Ignite

name: Bao Zhu Zhao Fu
description: Bao Zhu Zhao Fu

name: Bank Buster
description:
Get ready to break the bank with Bank Buster™. Combining thrilling play with repeat wins for the ultimate jackpot chase, you can select between base games Buffalo, Pompeii, or Louie’s Gold. Piggy Coins award Cash-on-Reel prizes, free games, and progressive jackpots you can buy directly into the bonus features. This is fun you can take to the bank.

Game Features:

• THREE CLASSIC TITLES: Player selectable multi-game with three classic titles
• EXCITING PIGGY COINS: Trigger free games with Expand, Jackpot, and Repeat Win features
• REPEAT WIN: First triple metamorphic with repeat wins

name: Autumn Moon
description:
Open the golden doors to Asia with Autumn Moon™, part of the Dragon Link™ / Dragon Cash™ family. This brilliant, colorful game features the famous Hold & Spin feature, scalable bonus prizes, Cash-on-Reels and the ability to win up to 250x your bet on a scatter. During the Autumn Moon Free Games, all special symbols will reveal the same symbol, including the chance for the big jackpot. Enjoy the entertainment as you play this true fan favorite.

Game Features:

• HOLD & SPIN JACKPOT: Lightning Link™ inspiration that uses a common orb trigger symbol across all game themes for uniformity
• GRAND JACKPOT: Exciting top progressive prize
• FREE GAMES: Free Games with mystery symbols

name: Aristocrat Classics
description:
Aristocrat Classics is a highly flexible pack that lets operators enable updated denoms and configurations to legacy games. Whatever your casino player base is, you can mix and match from a variety of content for an optimized game profile filled with all their favorite legacy content.

Game Features:

• PACK 1 CONTAINS:: Buffalo, Buffalo Gold, Sun & Moon, Queen of the Nile, Sky Rider Golden Amulet, Pompeii
• ADDITIONAL GAMES: Dancing Foo, Mighty Cash Long Teng Hu Xiao, Extra Bonus Wilds
shortDescription: Legacy content in one multi-game pack

metaTags.title: Aristocrat Classics
metaTags.description: Legacy content in one multi-game pack

name: 5 Dragons Rapid
description:
Take to the skies and collect rewards in this fast-hitting game that drives excitement and rewards through an abundance of features. 5 Dragons™ Rapid offers 7 game features with varying volatility, triggered by collecting three or more coins across your reels. The new Chest Reels give you more ways to activate a feature by collecting Special Coin symbols. The lucrative Jackpot feature can be triggered to convert matching symbols into bonus awards!

Game Features:

• FREE GAMES: Triggered by three or more coin symbols from left to right. There are 7 feature choices with different volatilities including mystery feature
• CHEST REELS: Feature can be awarded with the Special Coin symbol which appears on reels 2, 3 and 4 (called Chest reels). Whenever the Special Coin symbol appears, there is a chance that one or two features may be awarded per symbol
• JACKPOT: The Jackpot feature can be won randomly during any bought game during the a pick’em bonus. Once the Jackpot Feature is triggered, 12 Coins will appear. When three matching symbols have been revealed, the corresponding Jackpot or bonus will be awarded
